statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ 0 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 11 \\ -1 \\ 10 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ 0 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 11 \\ -1 \\ 10 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
